PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-02292012-03-01,  DFAIT,  ,  ,  , 
ActAuditor General Act
SubjectAuditor General - International Labour Organization ** External Auditor **
PrecisOrder requesting the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA to inquire into and report upon the accounts and affairs of the INTERNATIONAL LABOUR ORGANIZATION as the External Auditor of the Organization, for a period of four years as of April 1, 2012.
AttachmentsAttachment
